title: This Game is WILD!  - Thank Goodness You're Here Review
description:
Is this the funniest game of the year? From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y0WO2hmvPfI&pp=ygUJZ2FtZXNjYXN0 Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% OFF 2 or more pairs of shades.
Go to http://hims.com/kindafunny to start your free online visit today.
Head over to KindaFunny.com/store to pick up your copy of Portillo the Wiener Dog Thinks He’s a Manatee and the new line of Portillo merch!"

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
